trans-unit.source: Creates and deletes Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: Crea ed elimina la radice virtuale di Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>interfaccia definisce i metodi per la creazione e l'eliminazione delle radici virtuali in IIS 6.0.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the IISVirtualRoot class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Questa interfaccia è implementata solo dalla classe IISVirtualRoot e viene utilizzata solo all'interno dell'infrastruttura di .NET Framework durante la creazione di un'abilitato per SOAP COM+ radice dell'applicazione virtuale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>non devono essere implementati direttamente nel codice.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare invece la <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>classe che implementa il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>interfaccia che contiene il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>e <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>metodi.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>non è completamente viene implementata da <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: IISVirtualRoot is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: IISVirtualRoot viene utilizzata internamente da .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario utilizzarla direttamente nel codice.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Crea una radice virtuale Internet Information Services (IIS).

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the Create method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Non è necessario chiamare il metodo Create dal codice.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare invece il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>metodo.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string with the value `"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"` representing the root Web server.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa con il valore `"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"` che rappresenta il server Web radice.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to `PhysicalPath` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso fisico della radice virtuale, che corrisponde a `PhysicalPath` dal <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>metodo.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to `VirtualRoot` from <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della radice virtuale, che corrisponde a `VirtualRoot` <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa in cui è possibile scrivere un messaggio di errore.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Elimina una radice virtuale Internet Information Services (IIS).

trans-unit.source: Even though it is public, the Delete method is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: Anche se è pubblico, il metodo Delete non deve essere chiamato direttamente.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, there is the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è il <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>metodo.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, this method is not fully implemented.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, questo metodo non è completamente implementato.

trans-unit.source: The root Web server, as specified by `RootWebServer` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il server Web radice, come specificato da `RootWebServer` dal <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*>metodo.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso fisico della radice virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della radice virtuale.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa in cui è possibile scrivere un messaggio di errore.
